data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick Hiroshima.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Throw-in for Tokyo at EDION Stadium.
Goal kick for Tokyo at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 14, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Yuki Nogami puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Yusuke Chajima.
In the minute 17, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Diego Oliveira grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at EDION Stadium.
Leandro with an assist there.
Tokyo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hiroshima.
In the minute 22, Goal! Shuto Abe gives Tokyo a 1-2 lead in Hiroshima.
Great play from Arthur Silva to set up the goal.
Hiroshima are caught offside.
In the minute 26, Hiroshima are whistled for offside.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima attack through Sho Sasaki. The finish is off target, however.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 32, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hayato Araki (Hiroshima) levels the match at 2-2 with a header.
In the minute 37, Yuya Asano instrumental with a fine assist.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Diego Oliveira for Tokyo has been booked by Yoshiro Imamura and receives a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Tokyo!
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! The away team take a 2-3 lead through Leandro.
The second-half is underway at EDION Stadium.
Tokyo make their first substitution with Takuya Uchida replacing Kensuke Nagai.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Yoshiro Imamura signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Hiroshima's area.
In the minute 51, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
The home team replace Yuya Asano with Leandro Pereira.
Rhayner is replacing Toshihiro Aoyama for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Hiroshima's Hayato Araki has been booked in Hiroshima.
In the minute 57, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Ryoya Ogawa of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hiroshima drives forward and Rhayner gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Yoshiro Imamura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Adailton is on a sub for Diego Oliveira for Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 63, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 65, Yoshiro Imamura signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Yoshiro Imamura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 68, At EDION Stadium, Yoshifumi Kashiwa has been yellow-carded for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 75, Yoshiro Imamura signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's third substitution at EDION Stadium with Joan Oumari replacing Leandro.
In the minute 79, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Hirotaka Mita is replacing Shuto Abe for the away team.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Yoshiro Imamura.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
It's 3-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Hayao Kawabe gets an equalizer for Hiroshima. The score is now 3-3.
